document_data.name: Auld Tharian
document_data.mainbody: '''Auld Tharian''' was a dead language in the [[North Thorass languages|North Thorass language group]]. It was the predecessor to the [[Tharian]] tongue, which was spoken in the Northern [[Moonsea]] region.<ref name=D:SiT-pp26,28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26,28}}
